sentences.english: Hot and fresh out of the dishwasher.
sentences.chinese: 从洗碗机里新鲜出炉的热腾腾的蛋糕。

sentences.english: The dishwasher sponged off the dishes.
sentences.chinese: 洗碗机把那些盘子洗了。

sentences.english: Use rubendr gloves to wash dishes.
I am busying washing the dishes, would you answer the phone, Tony?
sentences.chinese: 我正在洗碗，你接一下电话好吗，汤尼？

sentences.english: A: Honey, would you please put the dishes in the dishwasher?
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的，你能把碗碟放进洗碗机里吗？

sentences.english: Washing dishes just doesn't sound as good as chaperoning passengers on exotic excursions.
sentences.chinese: 洗碗就不如陪同船上的旅客听起来体面。

sentences.english: Some installed alexipharmic ark, did not configure dishwasher again however.
sentences.chinese: 有的设置了消毒柜，却又没有配置洗碗机。

sentences.english: Put the dishes in the dishwasher.
I must sweep the floor and wash the dishes.
These "kitchen sink" languages try to do everything for everyone.
sentences.chinese: 这些“洗碗槽”语言试图为每个人做所有事。

sentences.english: But are wallets a more serious menace than salmonella-encrusted kitchen sinks?
sentences.chinese: 但是，钱夹比携带沙门氏菌的厨房洗碗池更具威胁吗？

sentences.english: Distribution measured with the dishwasher uses.
sentences.chinese: 配合洗碗机分配计量器使用。

sentences.english: Morgan's family has a counter-top dishwasher.
sentences.chinese: 摩根家的厨房台面上有个洗碗机。

sentences.english: Guests can benefit from a fully-equipped kitchen and a living room.
sentences.chinese: 客人可以享用带洗碗机的设备齐全的小厨房。

sentences.english: Operates an automatic dishwashing machine that cleans and washes plates, cups, saucers, silverware, glasses and other dishes.
sentences.chinese: 正确使用洗碗机清洁盘，杯，碟子，银具，玻璃杯等。

sentences.english: G:Will you do the dishes after the meal?

definition: to pick the edible part of vegetables
to mop the floor/(of a gown etc) to trail on the ground/full-length
to go to the kitchen (to prepare a meal)/to cook
to stir-fry/to do the cooking/stir-fried dish
to wash one's hands/to go to the toilet
to have a meal/to eat/to make a living
